text:
@KamalaHarris Another way to look at it...
Blacks make up 14% of the US population. 
Deaths of Blacks from COVID19 
22.6% 
Data from 104,329 deaths. Race/Ethnicity was available for 86,658 (83%) deaths.
https://t.co/HxBtfBk4aE
